attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Trust and confidence in our MP's are at a record low.

MP's apparent lack of honesty, abuse of their privileged positions and failure to self regulate are damaging the running of this country.  

I call for a general election so that we can start afresh and move forward to repairing our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
